channel.title: How to run a 508/525 client on a Mac OS X!
channel.description:
WRONG SECTION, MOD PLEASE MOVE
Well, ive never posted so i thought hey lets post something useful :P.
Okay, full credit goes to this guy on youtube, if it helps even more i will link you to the video.
You will have to watch the video to understand this tho, the codes are here what you have to do.
[u][b]Video:[/b][/u] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LtdwQssfSEw
/System/Library/Frameworks/JavaVM.framew­ork/Versions/1.6.0/Home/bin/ Then Add : java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1 Or whatever it says when your try to run it.

item.title: How to run a 508/525 client on a Mac OS X!
item.dc:creator: @Spy2805 Spy2805
item.description:
@Spy2805 wrote:

WRONG SECTION, MOD PLEASE MOVE

Well, ive never posted so i thought hey lets post something useful :P.

Okay, full credit goes to this guy on youtube, if it helps even more i will link you to the video.

You will have to watch the video to understand this tho, the codes are here what you have to do.

Video:

/System/Library/Frameworks/JavaVM.framew­ork/Versions/1.6.0/Home/bin/
Then Add :
java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1
Or whatever it says when your try to run it.
